question: Suhas is standing facing West. He turns 225° in the anti-clockwise direction and after that 135° in the clockwise direction. Which direction is he facing now ?

Point P is 11 km towards the East of point Q. A man starts from point Q and travles 9 km towards the West. He then takes a left turn and travels 4 km. He finally takes a left turn and travles 20 km before stopping. How far and towards which direction he must travel in order to reach point P?
If South becomes North-East and North-West becomes South and the direction are arranged accordingly, then what will South-West become?
